mapper.sql: LGCS_AREA_ID AS lgcsAreaId, AREA_ID AS areaId, LGCS_AREA_CODE AS lgcsAreaCode, LGCS_AREA_NAME AS lgcsAreaName, DIVISION_LEVEL AS divisionLevel, SPELL AS spell, SHORT_SPELL AS shortSpell, ifnull(FULL_CODE, '') AS fullCode, ifnull(FULL_NAME, '') AS fullName, (CASE DEL_FLG WHEN '1' THEN '是' ELSE '否' END) AS delFlg, ifnull(UPD_ID, '') AS updId, UPD_TIME AS updTime
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO md_logistics_area ( LGCS_AREA_ID, AREA_ID, LGCS_AREA_CODE, LGCS_AREA_NAME, DIVISION_LEVEL, SPELL, SHORT_SPELL, FULL_CODE, FULL_NAME, DEL_FLG, CRT_ID, CRT_TIME, UPD_ID, UPD_TIME, ACT_ID, ACT_TIME, VER ) SELECT ifnull(MAX(LGCS_AREA_ID),0) + 1, #{areaId}, #{lgcsAreaCode}, #{lgcsAreaName}, #{divisionLevel}, #{spell}, #{shortSpell}, #{fullCode}, #{fullName}, #{delFlg}, #{crtId}, #{crtTime}, #{updId}, #{updTime}, #{actId}, #{actTime}, #{ver} FROM md_logistics_area
mapper.update: update md_logistics_area set AREA_ID=#{areaId}, LGCS_AREA_CODE=#{lgcsAreaCode}, LGCS_AREA_NAME=#{lgcsAreaName}, SPELL=#{spell}, SHORT_SPELL=#{shortSpell}, FULL_CODE=#{fullCode}, FULL_NAME=#{fullName}, UPD_ID=#{updId}, UPD_TIME=#{updTime} WHERE LGCS_AREA_ID=#{lgcsAreaId}
